articles.title: Devastating 'Heat Dome' Keeps Shattering Extreme Temp Records in North America - ScienceAlert
articles.description: A "heat dome" over western Canada and the US Pacific northwest sent temperatures soaring to new highs, triggering heat warnings from Oregon to Canada's Arctic territories on Sunday.
articles.content:
